body:
Comment 7 by **tyler@stretchr.com**: 
I'm currently working on this issue and I am making progress.

My initial research is showing that it may not be possible to prompt the user for input
when using a script to generate the package. It seems you must write a plugin and
install it through the PackageMaker UI.

I am going to attempt to make the package simply remove the old go installation without
informing or prompting the user.

Also, there was a bug introduced in package.bash by (I think)
https://golang.org/cl/5666046/

package.bash can not locate the dist tool as the directory to which it is installed has
changed. I've fixed this bug, but I don't know if I should commit it as part of THIS
issue, or make a new issue.
